price: 9. Azui bizaleli ya lolendo mpe ya mabe тропа kobungisa bato nzela ya Allah, (moto) wana akozua mabe awa na nsé тре о mokolo ya suka tokopesa ye etumbu ya kozikisama.
arabic: ثَانِيَ عِطۡفِهِۦ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ لَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا خِزۡيٞۖ وَنُذِيقُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
